body:
Dear Guedi:

You can download a version of the full paper which has been published in
Energy and Buildings vol 38:7 under
http://irc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/pubs/fulltext/nrcc48165/nrcc48165.pdf.

Christoph

-----Original Message-----
[mailto:radiance-general-bounces@radiance-online.org] On Behalf Of
Gregory J. Ward
Sent: Tuesday, November 21, 2006 12:50 PM
To: Radiance general discussion
Hi Guedi,

You should check out Christoph Reinhart's presentation "Development and
validation of a Radiance model for a translucent panel " from last
year's Radiance workshop:

http://irc.nrc-cnrc.gc.ca/ie/light/RadianceWorkshop2005/

He has written a paper on the topic with Marilyne Anderson of MIT
(formerly EPFL), but I'm not sure it's out yet.

-Greg

http://www.radiance-online.org/mailman/listinfo/radiance-general
